title: Available OMOP CDM Synthetic Datasets — omopDatasets
Available OMOP CDM Synthetic Datasets — omopDatasets
text: data frame 4 variables: dataset_name Name dataset. url url download dataset. cdm_name Name cdm reference created. cdm_version OMOP CDM version dataset.

title: Available OMOP CDM Synthetic Datasets — omopDatasets
code: omopDatasets #> # A tibble: 24 × 4 #>    dataset_name               url                           cdm_name cdm_version #>    <chr>                      <chr>                         <chr>    <chr>       #>  1 GiBleed                    https://example-data.ohdsi.d… GiBleed  5.3         #>  2 synthea-allergies-10k      https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #>  3 synthea-anemia-10k         https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #>  4 synthea-breast_cancer-10k  https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #>  5 synthea-contraceptives-10k https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #>  6 synthea-covid19-10k        https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #>  7 synthea-covid19-200k       https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #>  8 synthea-dermatitis-10k     https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #>  9 synthea-heart-10k          https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #> 10 synthea-hiv-10k            https://example-data.ohdsi.d… synthea… 5.3         #> # ℹ 14 more rows
